parameters.query:
={{ `INSERT INTO study_materials 
  (id, user_id, subject_id, chapter_name, material_type, processing_summary, 
   vector_collection, chunk_count, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
  ('${$json.material_id}', '${$json.user_id}', '${$json.subject_id}', 
   '${$input.all()[0].json.chapter_name || 'General'}', 
   '${$input.all()[0].json.material_type}',
   '${JSON.stringify($json.processing_summary).replace(/'/g, "''")}',
   '${$json.collection_name}', ${$json.processing_summary.chunks_created},
   NOW(), NOW())
ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
  processing_summary = EXCLUDED.processing_summary,
  chunk_count = EXCLUDED.chunk_count,
  updated_at = NOW()` }}
